```console
set nocompatible
filetype plugin on
syntax on
set number
set noswapfile
set hlsearch
set ignorecase
set incsearch
set shellcmdflag=-ic
command PW call vimwiki#html#WikiAll2HTML(expand(vimwiki#vars#get_wikilocal('path_html')), <bang>0) | !git add . && git commit -m "wiki updates" && git push && rsync -avz -e "ssh -i ~/.ssh/resilio-lightsail-key.pem"  ~/vimwiki_html ec2-user@11.111.111.111:/var/data | exit
```
